text: NGC 5002 is a Magellanic spiral galaxy in Canes Venatici. It was discovered by Heinrich d'Arrest in 1865. It is also known as MCG 6-29-51, PGC 45728, UGC 8254. It has an apparent size of 1.7 by 1.0 arcmin. == References == == External links == * 5002 08254 045728 Category:Canes Venatici Category:Barred spiral galaxies
title: NGC 5002
